#summary Module "binary"

= Binary module =

Defined in files `binary.js` and `binary.so`/`binary.dll`/`binary.dylib`.

== Binary/B ==

This module aims to implement the [http://wiki.commonjs.org/wiki/Binary/B CommonJS Binary/B] specification. So far, the following is *NOT* done yet:

  * splice(), displace()

Also, the implementation differs from the standard a bit:

  * indexOf/lastIndexOf/split accepts only Number as a first argument
  * pop/push/shift/unshift methods accept Number, Array, !ByteString and !ByteArray arguments
  * `new ByteString()` does not throw
  * !ByteString.join == !ByteArray.join
